A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A real disappointment. Heartbroken over what they did to Star Wars. Lots of unnecessary scenes\, too long\, Leia's Mary Poppins scene was absolutely awful. and...Lots and lots of bad attempts at humor. No explanation of anything related to Snoke\, Rey\, and others. Why didnt Leia die? weird. just Weird. The critics have this one wrong. it has some cool ideas but never really delivers. I so wanted to like this movie. Oh well.
